en: Okay, #NAME. It's time to see how you did.
You made #MONEY_MONTH this month. That's over $2,000. Hurrah, you did it!
I'm so happy for you. As the month went on, I was really struggling... I felt like a terrible partner.
It was hard for me to decide whether I should put your dreams or my mental wellbeing first.
I'm glad that, now, I don't have to worry about it. If I get anxious, I'll remind myself you're doing all right.
